sequences.name: US Enterprise B2B SaaS - Revenue Leaders Outreach Sequence
sequences.persona_name: US Enterprise B2B SaaS - Revenue Leaders
sequences.objective: Secure an exploratory call to address involuntary churn and revenue ops automation

touches.objective: Introduce involuntary churn from failed payments
touches.subject_line: Reduce involuntary churn from failed payments
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, noticed {{company}} is scaling recurring offerings. Many enterprise SaaS revenue teams lose ARR to failed payments and involuntary churn—billing retries and manual recovery eat into forecasts. Stripe Billing automates retry logic, dunning and payment recovery, recovering churned ARR without more headcount. Would it help if I shared a 2-min note on how peers recovered recurring revenue?
touches.hints: Personalize with recent product launches or renewal cycles

touches.objective: Share customer ARR recovery case study
touches.subject_line: How a peer recovered $2M ARR after reducing declines
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, quick note — one enterprise SaaS we work with automated retries and invoice recovery with Stripe Billing and recovered ~$2M ARR while simplifying collections for finance. Happy to send the one-pager if useful.
touches.hints: Reference a comparable enterprise SaaS customer or public ARR metric if available

touches.objective: Deep dive on revenue recognition for complex subscriptions
touches.subject_line: Automate complex revenue recognition for subs
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, finance teams at enterprise SaaS often spend weeks reconciling multi‑element and long-term subscriptions. Stripe Billing’s built-in revenue recognition and reporting reduced close time for one finance org by weeks and eliminated manual journal entries. I can share a short ROI snapshot showing time saved — want that?
touches.hints: Attach a 1-page revenue recognition ROI snapshot or mention quarter-end pain points

touches.objective: Highlight localized checkout to reduce declines in new regions
touches.subject_line: Localized checkout to cut payment declines in EMEA/APAC
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, as teams expand globally, inconsistent checkout and limited local payment methods drive declines. Stripe Payments + Checkout added local methods for a global SaaS peer and lowered decline rates in new regions—happy to share the customer brief.
touches.hints: Praise any recent regional expansion or new market announcement

touches.objective: Request a brief exploratory meeting on billing and payment ops
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, following up on payment declines, involuntary churn and revenue recognition — would you be open to a 20‑minute call next week to review how automated billing and localized payments could protect ARR and simplify close for {{company}}?
touches.hints: Call during local business hours; reference prior email and LinkedIn touches

sequences.name: EU Mid-Market Marketplaces - Platform Ops Outreach Sequence
sequences.objective: Start a conversation about speeding seller onboarding and automating payouts/VAT

touches.objective: Introduce slow KYC/AML onboarding that lowers activation
touches.subject_line: Speed up seller onboarding and KYC
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, noticed {{company}} runs a growing EU marketplace. Platform teams often lose activation because manual KYC/AML checks slow seller onboarding. Stripe Identity + Connect automates KYC, ties verified identities to accounts and increases activation rates. Can I share a short note on how peers sped onboarding by weeks?
touches.hints: Reference marketplace type (goods/services) and recent seller growth metrics if available

touches.objective: Share case study on faster onboarding via automated identity checks
touches.subject_line: How a marketplace cut onboarding time 60%
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, quick share — a mid‑market marketplace we worked with integrated Stripe Identity and reduced onboarding time ~60%, improving activation and first-sale rates. I can send the 1-page case study.
touches.hints: Mention a similar-sized marketplace or number of sellers if known

touches.objective: Deep dive on VAT/payout reconciliation errors and delays
touches.subject_line: Reduce payout delays and VAT reconciliation errors
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, multi‑party payouts and VAT reporting often create reconciliation errors and delayed seller payouts. Combining Stripe Connect with Stripe Tax automated fund routing and VAT calc for one customer, cutting reconciliation time and getting payouts out on schedule. Would a quick 10‑minute call to review reconciliation flows help?
touches.hints: Attach brief reconciliation checklist or mention common VAT pain by country (e.g., DE/FR/IT)

touches.objective: Request meeting to discuss automating payouts and VAT
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, following up on KYC, payouts and VAT — are you available for a 15‑minute call this week to see how Connect + Tax can reduce payout delays and reconciliation work for {{company}}?
touches.hints: Call mid‑morning CET; reference earlier case study and emails

touches.objective: Introduce cross‑border settlements and FX friction solution
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, another angle — marketplaces lose take‑rate and speed from FX friction and slow settlements. Stripe Treasury with Connect centralizes currency flows and speeds settlements for sellers. If cross‑border settlements are a priority, I can share a short brief.
touches.hints: If known, reference top cross‑border corridors or currencies your marketplace uses

sequences.name: APAC Large Retail & E‑commerce - Commerce Leaders Outreach Sequence
sequences.persona_name: APAC Large Retail & E-commerce - Commerce Leaders
sequences.objective: Book a short call to reduce cart abandonment and unify payments/tax across APAC

touches.objective: Introduce high cart abandonment from non‑localized checkout
touches.subject_line: Cut cart abandonment with localized checkout
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, saw {{company}} serves multiple APAC markets. Many APAC commerce teams see high cart abandonment from slow or non‑localized checkout flows—missing regional methods like Alipay, PayNow or Paytm hurts conversion. Stripe Checkout offers a prebuilt localized flow that drives conversion lift. Interested in a short CRO note?
touches.hints: Personalize by referencing specific APAC markets served (e.g., Singapore, Australia, Japan)

touches.objective: Share customer result on reducing checkout friction
touches.subject_line: How a retailer cut checkout time 40%
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, sharing a customer example — a large APAC retailer implemented Stripe Checkout with local methods and reduced checkout time ~40%, lifting conversions. Happy to DM the one‑pager.
touches.hints: Reference a peer retailer or category (fashion, grocery, electronics) if available

touches.objective: Deep dive on reconciling POS and online sales inconsistencies
touches.subject_line: Unify in‑store and online reporting across APAC
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, inconsistent reconciliation between POS and online channels often creates reporting gaps and manual fixes. Stripe Terminal unifies in‑person transactions with Stripe Payments and central reporting—one retailer we work with eliminated daily reconciliation handoffs. I can send a short implementation checklist.
touches.hints: Mention POS systems in use or peak-store reconciliation pain points if known

touches.objective: Address APAC tax/GST complexity with automation
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, tax and GST complexity across APAC leads to manual calculations and refund mistakes. Stripe Tax automates GST/VAT rates, collection and reporting across APAC, reducing manual errors and compliance risk. Would you like a 1‑page look at automated tax flows for AU/SG/HK?
touches.hints: Reference specific tax regimes (Australia GST, Singapore GST) where applicable

touches.objective: Request brief exploratory meeting on checkout, POS and tax automation
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, circling back on checkout localization, POS reconciliation and GST automation — would a 20‑minute call next week be useful to map quick wins for {{company}}'s APAC operations?
touches.hints: Call during APAC local business hours; reference prior emails and LinkedIn messages
